Nevermind-it was my computer. For some reason it did not like playing that =
file. But after closing everything out and retrying several times to open i=
t, it finally played it.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Sum=
ption 
  To: grassharp@yahoogroups.com ; evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: S=
unday, April 19, 2009 9:43 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] A new DVR [7 Attachments=
]


  [Attachment(s) from Frank Sumption included below] 



  I bought a R=
adio Shack digital recored years, and never liked it much. I picked up an O=
lympus WS-21S this afternoon on a whim. I made a line to mic adapter, and d=
id a couple box recordings. I don't know, might be better than tape. I has =
the advantage of of built in USB connector, and it records in WMA format. 
=

   I tried a short recording last night using the tones in 51, I don't thi=
nk they help. 

   Frank-S
